### The 2026 Business Model

Since this is a Micro-SaaS, don't charge "per user." In 2026, the winning model is **"Per Metric Ton Tracked"** or **"Per Compliance Report Generated."** This aligns your revenue directly with the value you provide (staying out of legal trouble).
